author: Luke Broadwater
title: Former Pence Chief of Staff Has Testified to the Jan. 6 Committee

sentence: So far, three lawmakers have been asked to help with the investigation: Reps. Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.), Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and Scott Perry (R-Pa.).
author: Callie Patteson
title: Ex-Trump press secretary Kayleigh McEnany hands over texts to Jan. 6 panel

sentence: Kevin McCarthy, the minority leader, frequently breaks with McConnell in his expressions of fealty, in part because his caucus includes “Make America great again” extremists such as Madison Cawthorn, Matt Gaetz, Ronny Jackson, Jim Jordan and Marjorie Taylor Greene.
author: David Smith
title: Renewed opposition to Trump stirs among establishment Republicans

sentence: What to do with Mo Brooks and the GOP holdouts The panel hasn’t tipped its hand on how it will handle the three GOP lawmakers who refused to take part in voluntary interviews — GOP leader Kevin McCarthy and Reps. Scott Perry of Pennsylvania and Jim Jordan of Ohio — or whether it will fight to get testimony from other Republican lawmakers who worked with Trump ahead of Jan. 6.
title: 5 crucial decisions as Jan. 6 investigation reaches final stage
